website_summaries.verdict: A compact shelter that can be carried just about anywhere and provides minimal but effective sun protection.
pros: Very easy to assemble, take down, and store in its carry bag
Provides 1 full wall shade with partial shade on each side
Lightweight, weighing less than 5 lbs., and small enough to carry onto an airplane
cons: Support poles are flimsier than expected and can break if not handled with care

customer_reviews.title: Excellent medium/small sunshade with good durability and setup/take down
customer_reviews.text: After three uses at the beach, I would say this shelter works exactly as advertised and really is a 30 second setup/take down item. Very helpful when you have hands full with kids. Just be aware this is a smaller shelter, which is ok bc I bought it knowing that. It's probably big enough to fit one adult a child comfortably if you're sitting. The benefit is that it'd not an obnoxious beach item that blocks other's view, is very easy to transport, setup, etc. It functions well in medium wind with just sandbags filled on the sides. I havent had to use the stakes yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Bought after seeing my mom's costco brand in action and loving it. This is a fraction of the costco price and is exactly the same. Its super easy to put together by yourself and take down with minimal effort. In total it takes about 5 minutes to put together and take apart. I took it to the beach and just put my mini cooler in the back of the tent and didn't even need to add the stakes. At the end I just flipped it over and shook it out then broke it down and it was good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Chantyl7Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great beach shelter for pets or humans.
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the money versus the cheaper versions out there. It literally takes 30 seconds to setup and tear down. My dog loved it on the beach, plus plenty of room to get in with for a break from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Better than a Beach Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: The Lightspeed Quick Draw Sun Shelter is a better alternative for the beach than an umbrella. It is light, easy to set up and take down, and safer than an umbrella. One adult fits in it comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!! Very well-designed and easy to set-up
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely impressed. Takes literally 20 seconds to set-up. Very sturdy. The sand pouches are great for stability. They could easily charge 2xs the price and would still be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach.
customer_reviews.text: We used this all week at the beach. Perfect for little kids to take breaks from the sun. Couldn't be easier to open. A little tricky to collapse the first time but after that you're set. Super light weight, provides great shade and has multiple anchoring points.
customer_reviews.author: Gettinhectic

customer_reviews.title: nice tent for a toddler at the beach
customer_reviews.text: we took our daughter to the beach for the first time this summer and we purchased this tent so that we had a place for her to hang out outside of the sun. She loved the tent and dad didn't have a hard time setting it up. it literally is one step and then anchor it into the sand. We love how it has vents on the side to let it breath. it didn't get too hot in there for her and it was easy to clean up after we were done at the beach that day. the tent comes with a bag to carry it and it is not a large bag so it fits nicely in our car.
customer_reviews.author: Losadayas

customer_reviews.title: Super quick setup!
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as described. Some have described it as requiring quite a bit of strength to open and close. I think its more a matter of technique which i figured out after a couple of times. Just a note, this model does not have flaps for the windows which makes it difficult to use it as a wind shelter. It is however a nice shelter!
customer_reviews.author: Mainer

customer_reviews.title: Love it love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love!!! My family and my better half jokingly call this my "princess tent" !!! But, when I took it to the beach with my mother and my sister? They loved it too! And now they want one. So, jokes on them! I can set it up all by myself, & I don't have a lot of upper arm strength so it's fantastic for me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rogue

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight, and I love how they have the instructions sewn into the carrying bag just Incase you forget how to open and close this tent. Btw, its super easy to open and close, maybe 8 seconds.... awesome 👏 product.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Frey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! Perfect for the beach or a soccer game! Very easy to open and close once you try it a few times! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mama3

customer_reviews.title: Best shelter i have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best shelter i have ever bought. Easy to set up and take down. Beats spending 10 minutes trying to set up the ones with the poles.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Mura

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to set up and tear down - so fast!
customer_reviews.author: devalera01

customer_reviews.title: Very easy up and down
customer_reviews.text: Very easy up and down. Great for younger son to hang out in while his sister plays soccer. Can fit more then one child too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting shade from the sun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our summer trips out camping or by the lake/beach. We wanted a little spot where we could get a bit of relief from the hot sun. It is very easy to set up, and works well for us. It is quite small so don't plan on fitting a lot of people in it.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Florence

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We took this to the beach for our baby girl when she was just 2 months old. We were worried about sand with the wind and of course sun. This went up in a couple of seconds and went down just as easy! We will be able to use this or years to come! Perfect! I highly recommend this for any new parent!!
customer_reviews.author: brittany j dickson paul

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Quick and Easy setup. Great material. Great Product! Purchased it for soccer games and the beach
customer_reviews.author: Kim Jones

customer_reviews.title: works great, fast shipping, but wrong color
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for a beach trip. It arrived super fast! I opened the box a day before we left and it was pink/brown instead of blue/gray for my little boy. But we had to have it to keep the sun off of him for naps, so we packed it anyways. It is easy to set up & take down, super light to pack, but makes for a great sun shelter on the beach. Just wish it was in the right color!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use to avoid going to the beach in the dog days of summer because I couldn't stand the unrelenting sun. With this cabana, I can bring my own shade! Easy to set up and take down, I have managed to do it all by myself, even in mild/moderate windy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Slacking off

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase I made for the beach. My 9 month old granddaughter was able to relax and play inside of it without getting burned. It has openings on the sides for cross ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought it to keep our fair skinned 4 year old out of the sun during our older son's baseball games. It is very easy to set up and tear down. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Vaske

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Very easy for this grandma to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very easy for this grandma to put up and take down all by myself!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Kay McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Sun Shelter Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pack and carry. Pulls fully open in a snap. Good for couple to stay out of bright sun and relax.
customer_reviews.author: Papidad

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our beach vacation. We go one day of use out of this product. The first time we took it down the back pole broke. Because we bought it a month before our trip, it was after the return window to return it. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lora Kesler

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and disassemble. Was a total lifesaver at the beach. I would totally recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good.
customer_reviews.text: If you practice indoors one time and choose a calm day unless you have help you will very happy when getting used to set up which is dummy proof. A very weak person or child may need assistance pulling the cord to pop it open.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and take down.
customer_reviews.text: We had used this, at least 4 times in the last month and we loved it. Its so easy to set up and take down. Nothing to complain about. Having read about poles breaking, I tried to be as careful as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Janice QC

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up, great size and very portable
customer_reviews.text: So glad we ordered this. I often take my two sons to the beach with me and it's easy to set up by myself (and take down). It gives plenty of shade for all three of us.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Day

customer_reviews.title: They work perfect and keep my kids prepared for competition
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my track and field athletes. They work perfect and keep my kids prepared for competition.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cool! Have to practice closing BEFORE you go to the beach..lol.
customer_reviews.author: denise matusaitis

customer_reviews.title: Worked Like a Charm!
customer_reviews.text: I got this in time for my beach vacation and it worked as advertised. Easy to set-up and take down and worked perfectly for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect to take to the beach with our 9-month old. He napped in it every day. It is lightweight and so easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and easy
customer_reviews.text: This tent is great! I haven't used it at the beach yet but it's so easy to set up and put down! Takes about a minute to set up! My niece slept in it for almost a week in our house:)
customer_reviews.author: Oebjpjp

customer_reviews.title: Great beach shelter for a child
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and served the purpose of providing shade at the beach. Setup & removal required 2 people on very windy days but once in place it remained very sturdy. Easily a one-person job in less windy conditions. Compact & light for transport.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Super easy setup
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to setup and take down. A little small but still a very nice product. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Searles

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Got it for fishing trips actually...few shade trees in the area and this was better than all the ticks anyway. It is easy to put up...easy to put away but it seems to stick a bit trying to fold back down...don't like how rough you have to be with it to close it. Worked well for blocking the sun though which is what I wanted...already had skin cancer once so try to do what I can to avoid it again and this seemed to do a good job with the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Lodge

customer_reviews.title: Best tent ever!
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from vacation and used this tent every day! Everyone else on the beach was struggling putting up and then breaking down their tents. I am so glad I bought this. It pops up and breaks down in less then 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC. PLAN ON BUYING A BIGGER ONE
customer_reviews.text: MOST AMAZEING THING I HAVE EVER SEEN. FANTASTIC. PLAN ON BUYING A BIGGER ONE.
customer_reviews.author: Donna D. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Best Tent on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Got this tent as a replacement for the one I already had. Previous one I had, one of the arms broke at a plastic joint. Had it for two years prior to that. Live in Hawaii and use it almost every weekend. Tried a couple of similar options. Cant beat this tent and I came back. Pros: Quick Set-Up Light Fast Breakdown Easy Cleanup Cons: Can Break Easy. Durability
customer_reviews.author: Adam Chubbuck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite amazon purchase to date! Easiest set up and take down, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn woods

customer_reviews.title: Worked For Us
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs. Large enough for two small children and one adult to sit in for lunch, diaper changes, naps or an escape from the sun. A little tricky to put up in the wind, but we had practiced in the house a couple times so we knew what to expect. Spikes were a little flimsy. They are cheap plastic and actually bent as we were trying to push them into the beach sand. Can't imagine how they would go into hard dirt if camping. Overall, It provided what we needed - a place for a 2 month old to be out of the sun and still room for her 22 month old sister to take a nap.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Quick to set up/Tear Down
customer_reviews.text: Quick setup/tear down but only good for 2 people. Doesn't have any kind of flap in front so if sun is in front of you, you're out of luck. Light weight and easy to carry. Took it to Hawaii and checked it at the gate with no problem. Wish they made it bigger for three+ people.
customer_reviews.author: Caron J. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: As described - great, easy to pop up and collapse. Great for the beach. Comes in a lightweight bag and slings over the shoulder
customer_reviews.author: MirMirOnTheWall

customer_reviews.title: Extremely simple to set up
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to set up even in heavy winds on beach. Essential to fix pegs into sand in high winds
customer_reviews.author: andy crane

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my beach  trips
customer_reviews.text: It goes up so easy and packs just as easy. but also easy to carry with the carry case perfect
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Sun shade
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for the beach or the town pool and works great. Definitely a great buy for the money
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach or park
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to set up and take down. It is super fast and provides the perfect amount of shade for sunny days at the beach or the park. My only complaint is that one of the split. It still works, but gets stuck when setting it up. I'm hoping this was a defect in the one we bought because we will be buying another one for next season.
customer_reviews.author: bellaice

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Easy to transport, set up, and pack up for this mom of 2 little boys. Great spot to have a snack or a nap in the shade.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kinsella

customer_reviews.title: I love that it can be setup and taken down in ...
customer_reviews.text: We've only used this one now but, I love that it can be setup and taken down in seconds. Then when it is stored, it is about the size of a folder chair in the bag. Only thing that would make it better is if it had another screen on the back for air flow.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: So easy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: As a mom of two toddlers, I bought this so that when I take my two little ones to the beach it would be super easy to set us up by myself. I set it up in my back yard twice by myself and it was super easy to set up and take down. Also I am not the best at rolling or folding things back up perfectly. But the tent still fit in the bag it came in. It is a bit smaller then what I thought but I am looking forward to using it on the beach. I also bought a wonder wheel beach cart to make things easier. I am ready for the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Spring MC

customer_reviews.title: Easy, convenient and efficient shelter
customer_reviews.text: This shelter is very easy to put up and take down which makes it convenient for usage on the beach. The sandbags hold the shelter down well and keep it from falling over. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: easy to open and close - perfect at the beach
customer_reviews.text: While walking on the beach in Maine, we saw a couple with this shelter - the couple explained the umbrella spokes at the top and he ease of both opening and closing. We ordered it on Amazon and were very happy with the shelter. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret McLean Walsh

customer_reviews.title: This thing is silly SMALL
customer_reviews.text: What are people using this for? I wish I had looked on the mfg's website first, I would have seen the picture of the adult and 2 kids sitting on the ground in it. That's the ONLY way you can use this. And even an adult sitting in it, on the ground, you legs would be outside of it. It's useless to me, I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: John Brigan

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market
customer_reviews.text: After searching for days for a sun shelter, I came across the Lightspeed. It's perfect for me. Takes a few second to set up and take down. The stakes that came with it are better than those that come with more expensive tents. The stakes are grooved and have a hook. They are plastic though. Should be ok for most terrain. The mesh on the sides allows wind to pass through and keeps me cool.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky B

customer_reviews.title: Won't collapse down
customer_reviews.text: I cannot figure out how to take down this thing, so I have a tent sitting in my living room. I'm no idiot, the instructions are clear and simple, it's just that I feel I will break the entire tent before it collapses down. I finally did force it a bit and only one side collapsed and now it won't go back to a setup position.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect this tent to be as big as it was! I haven't taken it to the beach just yet, but hopefully it will work great. I think it can easily fit 2 adults and a child or two. It was pretty easy to set up and take down. I had to stand on something in order to pull the string to open it because I'm only 5'4 ft. Taking it down was a breeze and it fit right back into the bag that it came in. I didn't notice until afterwards that the instructions are sewn into the bag! :) I had no problems with it!
customer_reviews.author: T From NJ

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: This shelter is too small to provide shelter. There are no flaps to cover the windows either. It serves no purpose.
customer_reviews.author: annie37

customer_reviews.title: The product is great, but not on a windy day
customer_reviews.text: I took the tent to a small vacation in Fort Lauderdale. It worked great for the first three days. The wind got it broken on the fourth one:( I left it in a beach garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat Tent
customer_reviews.text: Super easy setup. Decent ventilation is allowed through the two sides. Hot sand does not translate well through the integrated floor. Also would like to add that contrary to what other reviewers have said, this shelter can be setup in such a way that it will not be affected by wind. With that said, if you don't anchor it and are pointing directly into the wind, it will take off like Mary Poppins. So be mindful of the basic rules of physics and don't let your shelter become a sail.
customer_reviews.author: danielboonecounty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We have used the tent twice and as promised it was very easy to put and take down. The second time we used it ,it was very windy so we filled the sand bags and used the tent stakes. The tent never moved.My 6 month old grand daughter took her nap in the shade and out of the wind. It would be nice to have a door for privacy but other than that we are very happy with the tent.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: very easy set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: This tent is so easy to set up and take down. After owning mulitple "pop up" tents that ended up in the garbage after my husband attempted to take them down, this tent was a blessing. Only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because it has lets a lot of sun in through the vents.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough for 2 people
customer_reviews.text: I used this shelter for the first time yesterday, and was disappointed at the size of it. I didn't practice my due diligence, and it is only large enough for one person and some light gear. I am 120 pounds, so I don't take up a lot of space. I opened my backpack chair, and it was a tight fit against the back of the shelter to keep it away from the front, and out of the sand. So this is a good shelter for one person at best, but if you're looking to hang out at the beach with others, this is not the shelter for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sierrahh

customer_reviews.title: Great little shelter!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several shelters and read tons of review before deciding on this particular one, and I am 100% happy I did. Used it at the beach. It was windy, but it didn't blow away like several others I saw. The stakes that come with it are a little short, I recommend a standard tent size stake for use on sand. It went up easy, down just as easy, and it stayed put. No tears, no problems. I saw the exact same one at a beach shop for over twice the price. Just the right size for two adults or a few kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: omg I love it
customer_reviews.text: "Lightspeed" is no joke!! This tent goes up and down in no time and is the perfect size. Its light weight, easy to put back in its bag, its great. I obsessively shopped around before I chose this one, even buying 2 prior and returning them, and I have no regrets. It was definitely the best choice for what I wanted. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: sarah s

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: light weight and easy to carry to the beach. easy to set up and easy to close. just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and do everything as advertised. Be aware that it is big, you need a car , you can't put it in the trolley.
customer_reviews.author: Tudor Mitu

customer_reviews.title: Broke after four times
customer_reviews.text: Directions on how to open and close aren't clear. Pole broke probably because I wasn't doing something correctly in closing it, but the directions are VERY unclear. Wish the product was more intuitive and durable to open and close. Have to buy another brand now.
customer_reviews.author: McCullers

customer_reviews.title: Bought it a month ago, BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: This product was great to use on the beach for my infant son before it broke. After the fourth use, when I was trying to close it, one of the poles snapped. I tried contacting the Lightspeed company, but to no avail. I still have not heard back from them. There is no way I will ever buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: LW

product_meta.title: Lightspeed Quick Draw Sun Shelter (Blue/Silver)
product_meta.description: The Lightspeed Quick Draw Sun Shelter is perfect for the beach, backyard, or any other place you need get some shade from the sun or protection from the elements. With the Lightspeed integrated pole system, the poles are built in to the tent, eliminating the difficulty associated with traditional separate pole tents. The revolutionary drawstring hub system allows the user to set up the tent quickly and easily. Lightweight and compact, it's easy to take anywhere!
feature_bullets: This easy up UPF 50 beach cabana is a perfect portable sun umbrella style shelter for 2 adults in low profile chairs
Instant canopy Open Size 6.5' L x 3.63' D x 3.7' H ; Packed size 36" x 5" ; Weight 4.6 lbs
2 mesh windows for ventilation; kid and dog durable PE floor; Umbrella rated 450mm PU coating for wet conditions
Easy to pack oversized carrybag, sand pockets, stakes, and guylines are included
Located in San Diego, our customer friendly 1 year warranty covers all Lightspeed Outdoors beach shade cabana tents

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
